Tutorial.description: HELLO || Welcome to Trezor. Press right to continue. || <cancel> <arrow_right>
Use Trezor by clicking the left and right buttons. Continue right. || <arrow_left> <arrow_right>
HOLD TO CONFIRM || Press and hold the right button to approve important operations. || <arrow_left> <HOLD TO CONFIRM>
SCREEN SCROLL || Press right to scroll down to read all content when text doesn't fit on one... || <arrow_left> <arrow_down_wide>
SCREEN SCROLL || ...screen. Press left to scroll up. || <arrow_up> <CONTINUE>
CONFIRM || Press both left and right at the same time to confirm. || <CONFIRM>
TUTORIAL COMPLETE || You're ready to use Trezor. || <AGAIN> <CONTINUE>
SKIP TUTORIAL || Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial? || <arrow_left> <SKIP>

WalletCreation.description: CREATE WALLET || By continuing you agree to Trezor Company's terms and conditions. || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
CREATE WALLET || More info at trezor.io/tos || <arrow_up> <CREATE WALLET>
SUCCESS || New wallet created. It should be backed up now! || <SKIP> <arrow_down_wide>
BACK UP WALLET || You can use your backup to recover your wallet at any time. || <arrow_up> <BACK UP>
SKIP BACKUP || Are you sure you want to skip the backup? || <SKIP> <BACK UP>
REMEMBER || Never make a digital copy of your backup or upload it online! || <OK, I UNDERSTAND>
STANDARD BACKUP || Write down all 12 words in order. || <SHOW WORDS>
I wrote down all 12 words in order. || <arrow_up> <HOLD TO CONFIRM>
CHECK BACKUP || Select the correct word for each position. || <CONTINUE>
SUCCESS || You have finished verifying your recovery seed. || <CONTINUE>
BACKUP IS DONE || Keep it safe! || <CONTINUE>
CHECK AGAIN || Wrong word selected! || <PLEASE CHECK AGAIN>

WalletCreationShamir.description: CREATE WALLET (SHAMIR) || By continuing you agree to Trezor Company's terms and conditions. || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
CREATE WALLET (SHAMIR) || More info at trezor.io/tos || <arrow_up> <CREATE WALLET>
SUCCESS || New wallet created. It should be backed up now! || <SKIP> <arrow_down_wide>
BACK UP WALLET || You can use your backup to recover your wallet at any time. || <arrow_up> <BACK UP>
SKIP BACKUP || Are you sure you want to skip the backup? || <SKIP> <BACK UP>
Number of shares. Set threshold. Write down and check all shares. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
NUMBER OF SHARES || = total number of unique word lists used for wallet backup. || <CONTINUE>
NUMBER OF SHARES || <number_select> || <arrow_left> <SELECT> <arrow_right>
Number of shares. Set threshold. Write down and check all shares. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
THRESHOLD || = minimum number of unique word lists used for recovery. || <CONTINUE>
THRESHOLD || <number_select> || <SELECT>
Number of shares. Set threshold. Write down and check all shares. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
REMEMBER || Never make a digital copy of your backup or upload it online! || <OK, I UNDERSTAND>
SHARE #1 || Write down all 20 words in order. || <SHOW WORDS>
<mnemonic words 1-3> || <arrow_up> <arrow_down_wide>
I wrote down all 20 words from share #1 in order. || <arrow_up> <HOLD TO CONFIRM>
CHECK SHARE #1 || Select the correct word for each position. || <CONTINUE>
SELECT 6TH WORD <word_choice> || <SELECT> <arrow_right>
Recovery share #1 checked successfully. Continue with share #2. || <CONTINUE>
SUCCESS || You have finished verifying your recovery shares. || <CONTINUE>
BACKUP IS DONE || Keep it safe! || <CONTINUE>

WalletCreationSuperShamir.description: Number of groups. Number of shares. Set sizes and thresholds. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
Number of groups. Number of shares. Set sizes and thresholds. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
Number of groups. Number of shares. Set sizes and thresholds. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
G1 - SHARE 1 || Write down all 20 words in order. || <SHOW WORDS>
GROUP 1 - SHARE 1 || Select the correct word for each position. || <CONTINUE>
Group 1 - Share 1 checked successfully. Continue with the next share. || <CONTINUE>
SUCCESS || You have finished verifying your recovery shares for group 1. || <CONTINUE>

PIN.description: PIN SETTINGS || Turn on PIN protection? || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
PIN SETTINGS || PIN will be required to access this device. || <arrow_up> <TURN ON>
PIN SETTINGS || PIN should be 4-50 digit long. || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
PIN SETTINGS || Position of the cursor will change between entries for enhanced security. || <arrow_up> <CONTINUE>
CHECK PIN || Please re-enter PIN to confirm. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
Entered PINs do not match! Please check again. || <CHECK AGAIN>
PIN SETTINGS || Are you sure you want to turn off PIN protection? || <cancel> <TURN OFF>
WRONG PIN || The PIN you have entered is not valid. || <CLOSE>
INVALID PIN || The new PIN must be different from your wipe code. || <CLOSE>

WipeCode.description: WIPE CODE SETTINGS || Turn on wipe code protection? || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
Wipe code can be used to erase all data from this device. || <arrow_up> <TURN ON>
CHECK WIPE CODE || Please re-enter wipe code to confirm. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
WIPE CODE SETTINGS || Change wipe code? || <cancel> <CHANGE>
WIPE CODE SETTINGS || Turn off wipe code protection? || <cancel> <TURN OFF>
INVALID WIPE CODE || The wipe code must be different from your PIN. Please try again. || <TRY AGAIN>

BackupCheck.description: BACKUP CHECK || Do you really want to check the recovery seed? || <cancel> <CONFIRM>
BACKUP CHECK || Select the number of words in your backup. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>
BACKUP CHECK || Enter your backup. (12 words) || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
BACKUP CHECK || You'll only have to select the first 2-3 letters for each word. || <arrow_up> <arrow_down_wide>
BACKUP CHECK || Position of the cursor will change between entries for enhanced security. || <arrow_up> <CONTINUE>
SUCCESS || The entered recovery seed is valid and matches the one in the device. || <CONTINUE>
The entered recovery seed is valid but does not match the one in the device. || <CONTINUE>
Invalid recovery seed entered. Please try again. || <TRY AGAIN>
ABORT BACKUP CHECK || Do you really want to abort the backup check? || <cancel> <CONFIRM>
BACKUP CHECK || 1 of 2 shares entered successfully. 1 more share needed. || <cancel> <ENTER SHARE>
SUCCESS || The entered recovery shares are valid and match what is currently in the device. || <CONTINUE>
SUCCESS || The entered recovery shares are valid but do not match what is currently in the device. || <CONTINUE>

Recovery.description: RECOVER WALLET || By continuing you agree to Trezor Company's terms and conditions. || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
RECOVER WALLET || More info at trezor.io/tos. || <arrow_up> <RECOVER WALLET>
RECOVER WALLET || Select the number of words in your backup. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>

RECOVER WALLET || You'll only have to select the first 2-3 letters for each word. || <arrow_up> <arrow_down_wide>
RECOVER WALLET || Position of the cursor will change between entries for enhanced security. || <arrow_up> <CONTINUE>
Invalid recovery seed entered. Please try again. || <TRY AGAIN>
ABORT RECOVERY || Do you really want to abort the recovery process? || <cancel> <arrow_down_wide>
ABORT RECOVERY || All progress will be lost. || <arrow_up> <CONFIRM>

Receive.description: ADDRESS MISMATCH? || Please contact Trezor support at trezor.io/support || <arrow_left> <QUIT>

Passphrase.description: PASSPHRASE SETTINGS || Turn on passphrase protection? || <cancel> <TURN ON>
HIDDEN WALLET || Next screen will show the passphrase. || <cancel> <CONTINUE>

HIDE PASSPHRASE || Hide passphrase coming from host? || <cancel> <CONFIRM>

CoinJoin.description: AUTHORIZE COINJOIN || Max rounds: <max_rounds> Max mining fee: <max_miming> || <HOLD TO CONFIRM>
COINJOIN IN PROGRESS || <loader> Waiting for others Do not disconnect your Trezor!
<loader> Loading transaction...  Do not disconnect your Trezor!
<loader> Signing transaction...  Do not disconnect your Trezor!
